name: [Round-Table Discussion] Meta-verse Mavericks #1 - The Future of AI in Web3 and Beyond
description:
Artificial Intelligence has been spinning the world on its head. While some speculate that AGI has already arrived, thought leaders in the field have taken a more nuanced stance.


Whether or not the world will soon be dominated by flying, crawling, swimming, shapeshifting - autonomous intelligent terminator robots…


Queena Tsai [ Co-Founder rct AI // Forbes 30U30 ] and Yannick Myson [ Brand Lead @ Delysium & Lucy-AI ] would like to invite the movers and shakers in AI x Crypto to a free-for-all round table discussion.


For the past 4 years, we’ve been building AI-powered tools that help shape the foundational building blocks of the Meta-verse.


Our backers, like Y-Combinator and Makers Fund, have graciously contributed to the swift development of our award-winning products.



The most recent edition to our Delysium’s multiverse is Lucy OS.



Lucy is an AI-powered Web3 virtual assistant that can help you learn about the latest projects, manage your assets and perform transactions without the hassle.



Within the first 20 days after launch, Lucy’s user base grew to over 1.2 million. This has demonstrated the bullish perspective the Web3 space has on AI.



As we quickly travel through the elbow curve of technological advancement, our decisions become increasingly important.



We wish to leave a lasting positive impact on the world.



This first edition of Meta-verse Mavericks is a light-hearted initiative to bring together the right minds:



Together we’ll embark on a journey into the depths of our fields, exploring the exciting new frontiers of AI in Web3, the Meta-verse, and beyond.



We want to create lasting serendipitous encounters that spark new ideas and collaborations that help society navigate this new ocean of opportunity.



If you’re active in building Web3, AI, Meta-verse, or anything in the direction thereof, you’re most welcome to join us.


Delysium Twitter 

Chat with Lucy 

rct AI
